title: 820-2914 death
message:
hello. i am just working in that board 820-2914

it is not turning on.

pluging in the macsafe the green light is coming short, then off. After 1,5seconds again short green, off.

I removed F7040and 7041. After that I had a flickering green light

the 12.6V are not stable, coming up then down to 0 and so on

I replaced U7000 2 times. On Q7035 pin 4 pulses are nice
on Q7030 its not stable

U7000 Pin 28/29 is 20Ohm

R7010/7011 is ok, R7051/7052 is ok

Q7080 replaced


I have red probe on ground with a good working board on D7005 Pin1/2 infinity, on this death board I have some like 1.080

Now the intresting:

If I hold the front end of the solder iron on pin 1 of L7030 then I have on Pin 2 L7030 12.54V not changing, green light is constant as well. If I take it back(the solder iron) green is flickering and Pin 2 L7030 is changing from 12.6 to 0.


need help please.

to be shure i replaced again u7000 but no change

there is still something not ok in the 3.41 or one wire circuit i think....

without F7040/41 should be minimum 3.41V stable

after plug in magsafe green light is coming up, 3.41V is coming up as well. it stays a few seconds and then no green light, no 3.41V

of course, no 3.41V no green light. could it be that the same process only quicker is going on when inserted F7040/41 ? and thats the reason for the flickering somehow ?

title: 820-2914 death
message: Stop messing around U7000. Your SMC_RESET is not stable. What are your values on SMC_RESET and U5010 now?
